root.name: Eiyuu*Senki
root.description: OverviewEiyuu*Senki is a turn-based strategy game with adult content for Windows. It sets the player on a quest to conquer the world by defeating famous world leaders from throughout history, who have all been re-imagined as stereotypical anime girls.At Comiket 2012 it was revealed that the game would be coming to the PS3 and PlayStation Vita, presumably with the adult content removed.
